item.title: Login screen code help
item.dc:creator: @i_Ban_U i Ban U
item.description:
@i_Ban_U wrote:

So I made another tab for info in my login screen but I need to make the cancel button work since when I click it nothing happens since theirs no code to it. I have the cancel button and login button working for the login screen page which is Loginscreenstate = 2
and this info one is gonna be screenstate 5. I am trying to add these two codes together so they will work but everytime I try I get compiel error, Maybe you can fix it for me? 

		<blockquote>} else {
		if (loginScreenState == 2) {       <---- [b]SET TO 5[/b]
			int j = super.myHeight / 2 - 40;
			j += 30;
			j += 25;
			if (super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickY >= j - 25 && super.saveClickY < j)
				loginScreenCursorPos = 0;
			j += 15;
			if (super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickY >= j - 25	&& super.saveClickY < j)
				loginScreenCursorPos = 1;
			j += 15;
			int i1 = super.myWidth / 2 - 80;
			int k1 = super.myHeight / 2 + 50;
			k1 += 20;
			if (super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= i1 - 75 && super.saveClickX <= i1 + 75 && super.saveClickY >= k1 - 20 && super.saveClickY <= k1 + 20) {
				loginFailures = 0;
				login(myUsername, myPassword, false);
				if (loggedIn) {
					return;
				}
			}</blockquote>

Now I want to add the same code but with loginscreenstate set to 5.

Read full topic
